Structs/FileStream.html#/s:12FileStreame.name: Callback
Structs/FileStream.html#/s:12FileStreame.abstract: The callback that is called whenever values are read from the file.

Structs/FileStream.html#/s:12FileStreame.name: init(fileDescriptor:callback:)
Structs/FileStream.html#/s:12FileStreame.abstract: Creates a new stream using the given file descriptor.

Structs/FileStream.html#/s:12FileStreame.name: beginStreaming()
Structs/FileStream.html#/s:12FileStreame.abstract: Starts streaming values from the given file descriptor.

Structs/FileStream.html#/s:12FileStreame.name: endStreaming()
Structs/FileStream.html#/s:12FileStreame.abstract: Ends streaming. Does not close the file descriptor.

Structs/FileStream.html.name: FileStream
Structs/FileStream.html.abstract: A file stream that continously reads the generic Value type from a given file.
